definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Laughter also reverberating in the ear, sigher engraved in the hearts.
sentences.chinese: 笑聲還回蕩在耳旁，情分依然刻在心上。

sentences.english: It was better when you didn't owe anybody.
sentences.chinese: 做人，你還是不欠人家的情分的好。

sentences.english: This is me send you private, not money, is the friendship to.
sentences.chinese: 這張是我送你私人的，不說錢，是朋友情分到了。

sentences.english: For old times' sake, I agreed to go with him.
sentences.chinese: 看在舊日的情分上，我同意和他一起去。

definition: feelings and sensibilities/sentiment and face/sensitivity to other's feelings
lit. not for the monk's sake but for the Buddha's sake (idiom)/fig. (to do sth for sb) out of deference to sb else
pinyin: bu4 kan4 seng1 mian4 kan4 fo2 mian4
